text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump 2 months too late. S. Korea acted early, tested, contact traced and isolated. The U.S. dropped the ball and is now playing catch up. And unless testing is ramped up considerable, will never catch up and will end up with wave after wave of #coronavirus deaths.
#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath https://t.co/YJ6H5fO1BQ
